thread.title: Kodak Black’s Debut Album ‘Painting Pictures’ Will Drop Next Week
thread.title_full: Kodak Black’s Debut Album ‘Painting Pictures’ Will Drop Next Week

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Kodak Black’s Debut Album ‘Painting Pictures’ Will Drop Next Week
text:
Kodak Black is back! Although he’s currently behind bars for a probation violation, the Pompano Beach rapper took to Instagram to announce his debut album. Titled Painting Pictures , it’s set to drop in T-minus seven days on Friday, March 31. Check out the sick cover art below, where a stylized Kodak – grills, face tatts, et al – sits in front of a portrait of himself in a graffitied room.
"Painting Pictures" Available Everywhere March 31st! #SG#PaintingPictures🎨 
A post shared by Project Baby (@kodakblack) on Mar 24, 2017 at 6:59am PDT 

The Florida rapper was released on bail in December, facing sexual battery charges. He’s currently being held in Broward Country for violating the terms of his probation from August 2016 charges. This album announcement is hot on the heels of his “Tunnel Vision” single, his highest-charting single to date, currently at No. 6 on the Hot 100.
Revisit “Tunnel Vision” below, his most political music video to date.

In other music news, Migos teamed up with The Roots and Jimmy Fallon for an office supply rendition of “Bad and Boujee.” Peep that right here .
